Thanks again for your comments and we hope that you'll stay with us again very soon!

title: Charged twice
review: Pros- They take dogs and have a nice green space to walk them. The pool looked great and they had a fitness room. The bar was nice. The person from room service the next morning went out of his way to get us breakfast so we could make our flight. Cons-The food was average. The phone didn't work, I tried to call when people were yelling and shouting at 1:00 am, no response. I tried to call for room service-didn't work. I tried to call with my cell phone, no one answered.  You need phones that work, that seems like the least to expect.....

title: Horrible nasty dirty yuk
review: Thank you very much for being our guest and for also for sharing your experience. Please accept my sincere apology for the lack of attention from the reception. We failed to live up to your service expectations and our own standards. We pride ourselves on offering exceptional service to all of our guests, I'm sorry that you did not experience us at our best. Rest assured, we are taking immediate action to prevent this from happening again and I have shared your comments with our management team to come up with an action plan for better training of our staff. We appreciate your business and would welcome an opportunity to restore a favorable impression the next time you are in our area.

title: What a disappointment!
review: I was charged twice, the night I stayed plus the no show for the same night. Few people on reception. They took 1 hour to understand the mistake and fix. Also, the orange juice offered on breakfast was never served. Poor service.

title: Spring Break with son 2018
review: Hotel is going through some remodeling. The room was an average 2 double bed room. No restaurant for dinner. The hotel was clean and nice but the prices were ridiculous! I paid $250+ a night for a $80 room. Regular parking is not free and is ridiculous. I would recommend staying there only if you have to or prices come way down.M

title: Not the best
review: I appreciate your feedback. I am very sorry that you felt the quality of your stay was not in line with our pricing. We take great pride in our excellent service staff, luxurious accomodations, and top-notch cuisine; providing this does sometimes come at a premium price. However, we try very hard to keep our pricing reasonable and competitive with the local Orlando hotels. Thank you again for your comments, and I hope you will come back soon.

title: DOUBLE BILLED- DIRTY- NO A/C- HORRIBLE PLACE!!!!!!!!
review: Our flight was canceled this hotel was within 2 miles of the airport. I booked no issue which I was thankful for. Then we arrive to find that the hotel is undergoing major construction which we weren’t notified of. They also have two different costs listed for overnight parking rate one being 8 dollars the other says 10. The charge you each time you leave the lot. The worst was the next morning waking up to a note that said all water was going to be shut off from 10-2 everyday. None of this was stated prior to booking. So upset with this hotel I think they should’ve been upfront and honest and perhaps not charge the full room rate since we were being inconvenienced. They need to work on their customer service.

title: Beatriz is a ROCK STAR
review: Thank you for being our guest and also for sharing your experience. I understand there were several issues with your stay, I'm sorry we were not able to meet your and our expectations for excellent guest service. While it saddens me any time a guest has a less than stellar experience, I am grateful that you took the time to explain the problems you had so that they can be promptly remedied. I've personally shared this review with my staff and management team and I'm confident that the problems you had can be quickly remedied. Please, do join us again soon, I promise your stay will be excellent.

title: A night at the Holiday Inn
review: Total crooks.  Don't ever stay here even if they claim the renovations are done.    I'm happy to post a review for great service. This was a horrible experience from beginning to end  Arrived late to find that the hotel is under major construction.  Too late to go anywhere else.  Room wasn't very clean.  Air didn't work in the room and the door didn't close right so I could see the hall lights around it.  Checked out the following morning and cancelled for the following day.  They gave me a discount on the stay.  Fine.  Two days later I get another bill on my credit card for the day I stayed plus two more days that I didn't at full price.  Called every day and left messages for a manager who is either never there or can't hear the calls because of the construction.  Bounced from…

title: Business-Social Weekend
review: Stayed there 22/2/18 through the weekend. There was a lot remodelling going on, which made check-in chaotic and room availability limited. But, Alicia, Lena, Michelle Beatriz, Dee and Adriana made it a far less painful experience.

title: Major renovation underway but nice property
review: Thank you for choosing us to stay with us while our remodel is going on. I'm glad our staff was able to make your stay much more pleasant. It's great to hear they were able to make such an impact. We appreciate the glowing review and invite you to stay with us again if you're ever back in Orlando.

title: Pathetic..
review: Hotel is undergoing a MAJOR renovation so be prepared for this if booking here. That said though, this property is going to be very nice once completed. The lobby bar area is simply gorgeous and has the largest tv over the bar that you will find anywhere. Nice rooms, plenty of shopping and dining in easy walking distance and a free 24 hour airport shuttle make this a solid choice when by the airport.

title: Only stay if you want to be treated as a non-entity
review: Thank you so much for your amazing review and staying with us towards the end of our renovation. We appreciate you noticing the TV it's over 300+ inches and noting our great location. The location along with service and comfort are among the top things we pride ourselves in. We certainly look forward to extending our hospitality again soon.

title: Never again
review: Arrived here 2/3 days ago and still here for 4 more nights (233 usd per night!!!) Hotel under renovation, dirty, dusty, poor breakfast, very noisy The cleaning in the rooms is erratic and my colleagues have called 3 times today to have their room cleaned... When I arrived my shower had still the feet marks of the previous customer! Not managed to get a manager yet to complain but this is the last time I will stay here

title: Weekend Whammy
review: 2/15-2/17/18:  When making reservations the staff neglected to tell us about the construction!!!!  Look at the photos.  $214.00 plus $26.00 nightly tax plus parking .... to waggle through painters and ripped up carpets, dust and glue smells!   Add to that all the additional workers in the hallways with paint cans, ladders, walking over drop cloths and ripped up carpet.    You would think IHG would offer a construction bonus to make its loyal customers (we are Spire elite). I’m sure this is a lovely hotel under non-construction, but really! We are on vacation away from dust dirt and mayhem-not wanting to be a part of it when we are away from home.    This IHG really dropped the ball when informing clients of the dirty conditions during reconstruction.  Perhaps construction…

title: Pre cruise
review: Thank you for taking the time to provide us with your review of our hotel. I understand there were several issues with your stay and I apologize that you did not have the outstanding stay you deserve. We try our best to put renovation announcements on all sites. I would also like to discuss what we can do to make it up to you. Please contact us at your convenience. I hope that we will have another occasion to meet your expectations and to welcome you back in the near future. Once our renovation is one please let me know beforehand so I can personally arrange your next reservation, and to make sure that you have a pleasant stay.

title: People waiting for rooms and construction underway
review: Under construction  .   Unable to get hold of the front desk to order the shuttle bus from the hotel had to get a taxi . Hotel very dusty.    breakfast was upstairs in one of the rooms weather was too cold to use the pool plus the pool needed cleaning .

title: Room was fine.
review: Thank you very much for being our guest and for also for sharing your experience. Please accept my sincere apology for the lack of attention from the front desk. We failed to live up to your service expectations and our own standards. We pride ourselves on offering exceptional service to all of our guests, I'm sorry that you did not experience us at our best. Rest assured, we are taking immediate action to prevent this from happening again. We appreciate your business and would welcome an opportunity to restore a favorable impression the next time you are in our area.

title: Breakfast in lobby now
review: I was not impressed at check-in by the way we and others were just told that our rooms were not ready. I mentioned that I would report this on Trip Advisor and a room miraculously became available. However, I found that construction is underway with dining rooms closed, the smell of paint and noise and dust and power extension cords in the corridors. I am attaching the view this afternoon  by the sixth floor elevator.  Unless you get a very low price I'd go somewhere else. I really dislike hotels that do this to guests. And I get really annoyed by signs that ask us to forgive them the noise and the dust because this is to make it better for us. Nonsense, I'll never come here again.
